Tri My Best

Tri My Best is a swim/bike/run event for youth (ages 4-18) with developmental disabilities including Autism, Cerebral Palsy, Muscular Dystrophy, and global delays.

Learn More

Tri My Way

An adaptive triathalon event for adults with disibilities ages 19 and up

Learn More

Workouts at the Junkyard

Train with expert coaches in a supportive community! Our adaptive workouts at The Junkyard of Greenville welcome athletes of all abilities and experience levels. Build strength, confidence, and connections in an environment where everyone can thrive.

Learn More
